EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar reminder - Insights to Action: How to Transform Your Business with Smart Applications
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[http://pivotal.io/big-data/webinar/how-to-transform-your-business-with-smart-applications]]> Thank you for registering for tomorrow's webinar Insights to Action: How to Transform Your Business with Smart Applications. Please see event details below:
Date: Wednesday, August 17, 2016 {{my.Save the Date:default=Save the Date}} Time: 11:00AM PDT Join the Session <[[http://event.on24.com/wcc/r/1214489/BCF5E9C39279FDF4E2C8FC3E7FDE8C53]]>
Audio Information: This webinar will be streaming live via your computer speakers.
We look forward to you joining us!
The Pivotal Team
